TopicTitle: I am Heavy Weapons Guy.... and this, is my weapon

Articles.Content:
I was messing around with overclocking things with the KAL controller with my friends yesterday and ended up making this monstrosity: a working, fully stock (with DLC) version of TF2 Heavy's minigun.

Featuring overclocked fireworks and rotating barrels, this thing took me over an hour to build and longer to calibrate. Best used with Infinite Propellant cheat on and Building Damage Multiplier set to max, so you can destroy the KSC.

Uploaded to KerbalX right here. Have fun.
